content:
That's great to hear that Yoga Studio has been helpful in supplementing your practice at home! It's awesome that you've found the customizable feature and "Focus On" section to be particularly useful in targeting specific areas like core strength and flexibility.

Consistency is key in yoga, and it's fantastic that the app has helped you stay on track even on days when you can't make it to the studio. It's also great that you're challenging yourself with more advanced classes and workshops – arm balances and inversions can be intimidating, but with consistent practice and preparation, you'll be able to tackle them with confidence!

Using an app like Yoga Studio can also help you develop a more mindful and introspective practice, as you're able to focus on your breath, alignment, and inner awareness in the comfort of your own home. It's a great way to deepen your practice and prepare yourself for more challenging classes or workshops.

Remember to always listen to your body and honor its limitations, especially when working on more advanced poses or transitions. It's okay to take it slow and modify or rest when needed – yoga is a journey, not a competition!

How do you plan on incorporating Yoga Studio into your practice leading up to the arm balances and inversions workshop? Are there any specific poses or sequences you're focusing on to prepare?
